text: The 1896 Invercargill mayoral election was held on 25 November 1896 as part of that years local elections. Councillor Josiah Hanan defeated fellow councillor John Stead. ==Results== The following table gives the election results: ==References== Category:1896 elections in New Zealand Category:Mayoral elections in Invercargill
title: 1896 Invercargill mayoral election
